text: The Burton Building is a historic building in Nogales, Arizona. It was built by Edward Burton as a hotel in 1916, and designed in the Chicago school architectural style. With It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since August 29, 1985. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Santa Cruz County, Arizona Category:Chicago school architecture in the United States Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1916 Category:1916 establishments in Arizona
title: Burton Building
